org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.datanode

Interface Replica

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ReplicaInPipelineInterface
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlockListAsLongs.BlockReportReplica, FinalizedReplica, ReplicaBeingWritten, ReplicaInfo, ReplicaInPipeline, ReplicaUnderRecovery, ReplicaWaitingToBeRecovered

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public interface Replica
    This represents block replicas which are stored in DataNode.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long getBlockId()
      Get the block ID
      long getBytesOnDisk()
      Get the number of bytes that have written to disk
      long getGenerationStamp()
      Get the generation stamp
      long getNumBytes()
      Get the number of bytes received
      HdfsServerConstants.ReplicaState getState()
      Get the replica state
      String getStorageUuid()
      Return the storageUuid of the volume that stores this replica.
      long getVisibleLength()
      Get the number of bytes that are visible to readers
      boolean isOnTransientStorage()
      Return true if the target volume is backed by RAM.
